channel.title: Pages on Otus9051's Tech Adventures
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Otus9051's Tech Adventures

item.title: About Otus9051
item.description: Hi, I am Otus9051 a.k.a. Steve (not my real name in any means). I first started coding when I was 5 (yes). I was mostly self-taught. My first language(?) was Visual Studio 6.0. My dad taught that (he’s a teacher) to his students, and here I am writing down notes on a Diary and then trying to code. Then came HTML, CSS, not JS and hopefully never Java, Python, Go, C, C++, Rust, Bash.
